name: Jewish Family and Children's Services (JFCS)
description: Founded in 1850, Jewish Family and Children’s Services (JFCS) is a lifeline for children, families, and older adults facing personal crises or challenges. Whether you need help for a major life transition or support for other challenges, JFCS offers many programs including home care for seniors, therapy for children, youth volunteer programs, services for people with disabilities, and much more.
